title: Origo Workshop
description: Flagship workshop conducted every year for freshers. A two-day hands-on workshop introducing robotics to first-year students of NIT Calicut.

title: M.Tech Mechatronics Workshop
description: Annual workshop for M.Tech students with lectures and sessions in the Mechatronics Lab, focusing on advanced robotics concepts.

title: UL Space Club Lecture
description: Conducted a one-day lecture on robotics followed by a mini expo for school students in UL Cyber Park.
